sentence: Tap, click or scroll to read more g What happened: Firebrand Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) said she agreed with Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and his government are corrupt.
title: Mo Brooks, jilted by Donald Trump, says the former president discussed rescinding the 2020 election with him during the last six months.
